title: Iran must abandon enriched uranium and not produce more, Netanyahu says
summary_full: The Israeli PM's comments come ahead of Iran-US talks in Geneva on Tuesday to discuss a nuclear deal.
summary_public: The Israeli PM's comments come ahead of Iran-US talks in Geneva on Tuesday to discuss a nuclear deal.
